name: Pristine world
description: Pristine world is a tower defense game which takes place in a magic world where only player stays between precious magical crystals and darkness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad or i3 / AMD Athlon™ FX-4300, or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia®  GTX 650 / AMD® Radeon 6700HD DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: You need it as well

reviews.review_text: Tower defense game with very nice graphics U need to use biological structures to defeat the enemy before they can reach your castle

Pristine world is a game that I can't recommend because: - the price is too much for it's quality - it is boring - it has a lot of issues - the controls are horrible - the graphics is really bad - it is pretty pointless - the only good reason to install this game is for the trading cards
